result.eng: We missed the first train.
result.ga: D'imigh an chéad traein orainn
result.orig: D'imigh an chéad traein orainn
result.html: D'imigh an chéad traein orainnWe missed the first train.
result.ponchtml: D'imiġ an ċéad traein orainnWe missed the first train.

result.eng: The office is on the first floor.
result.ga: Tá an oifig ar an chéad urlár
result.orig: Tá an oifig ar an chéad urlár
result.html: Tá an oifig ar an chéad urlárThe office is on the first floor.
result.ponchtml: Tá an oifig ar an ċéad urlárThe office is on the first floor.

result.eng: The first thing he reads is the sports page.
result.ga: An leathanach spóirt an chéad rud a léann sé
result.orig: An leathanach spóirt an chéad rud a léann sé
result.html: An leathanach spóirt an chéad rud a léann séThe first thing he reads is the sports page.
result.ponchtml: An leaṫanaċ spóirt an ċéad rud a léann séThe first thing he reads is the sports page.

result.eng: First of all, I must say that I am innocent.
result.ga: Ar an chéad dul síos caithfidh mé a rá go bhfuil mé neamhchiontach
result.orig: Ar an chéad dul síos caithfidh mé a rá go bhfuil mé neamhchiontach
result.html: Ar an chéad dul síos caithfidh mé a rá go bhfuil mé neamhchiontachFirst of all, I must say that I am innocent.
result.ponchtml: Ar an ċéad dul síos caiṫfiḋ mé a rá go ḃfuil mé neaṁċiontaċFirst of all, I must say that I am innocent.

result.eng: At first, I would like to welcome everybody.
result.ga: Ar dtús ba mhaith liom fáilte a chur roimh gach éinne
result.orig: Ar dtús ba mhaith liom fáilte a chur roimh gach éinne
result.html: Ar dtús ba mhaith liom fáilte a chur roimh gach éinneAt first, I would like to welcome everybody.
result.ponchtml: Ar dtús ba ṁaiṫ liom fáilte a ċur roiṁ gaċ éinneAt first, I would like to welcome everybody.

result.eng: It was very strange meeting my father for the first time.
result.ga: Bhí sé an-aisteach bualadh le m'athair don chéad uair
result.orig: Bhí sé an-aisteach bualadh le m'athair don chéad uair
result.html: Bhí sé an-aisteach bualadh le m'athair don chéad uairIt was very strange meeting my father for the first time.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé an-aisteaċ bualaḋ le m'aṫair don ċéad uairIt was very strange meeting my father for the first time.

result.eng: She was nice at first but she changed the tune after a while.
result.ga: Bhí sí lách i dtús báire ach d'athraigh sí an port tar éis tamaill
result.orig: Bhí sí lách i dtús báire ach d'athraigh sí an port tar éis tamaill
result.html: Bhí sí lách i dtús báire ach d'athraigh sí an port tar éis tamaillShe was nice at first but she changed the tune after a while.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí láċ i dtús báire aċ d'aṫraiġ sí an port tar éis tamaillShe was nice at first but she changed the tune after a while.

result.eng: It's a good detective story if the murder happens in the first paragraph.
result.ga: Is maith an scéal bleachtaireachta é ina dtarlaíonn an dúnmharú sa chéad alt
result.orig: Is maith an scéal bleachtaireachta é ina dtarlaíonn an dúnmharú sa chéad alt
result.html: Is maith an scéal bleachtaireachta é ina dtarlaíonn an dúnmharú sa chéad altIt's a good detective story if the murder happens in the first paragraph.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ an scéal bleaċtaireaċta é ina dtarlaíonn an dúnṁarú sa ċéad altIt's a good detective story if the murder happens in the first paragraph.

result.eng: I didn't attend the first event.
result.ga: Níor fhreastail mé ar an chéad imeacht
result.orig: Níor fhreastail mé ar an chéad imeacht
result.html: Níor fhreastail mé ar an chéad imeachtI didn't attend the first event.
result.ponchtml: Níor ḟreastail mé ar an ċéad imeaċtI didn't attend the first event.

result.eng: You are one of the first people who came tonight.
result.ga: Tá sibh ar na chéad daoine a tháinig anocht
result.orig: Tá sibh ar na chéad daoine a tháinig anocht
result.html: Tá sibh ar na chéad daoine a tháinig anochtYou are one of the first people who came tonight.
result.ponchtml: Tá siḃ ar na ċéad daoine a ṫáinig anoċtYou are one of the first people who came tonight.

result.eng: This is the first time that my children and I are on vacation since.
result.ga: Is é seo an chéad uair go bhfuil mise agus mo chlann ar saoire le chéile ó shin
result.orig: Is é seo an chéad uair go bhfuil mise agus mo chlann ar saoire le chéile ó shin

result.ponchtml: Is é seo an ċéad uair go ḃfuil mise agus mo ċlann ar saoire le ċéile ó ẛinThis is the first time that my children and I are on vacation since.

result.eng: Is the toilet the first door on the right?

result.eng: What time is the first lecture?

result.ponchtml: Cén uair a ḃíonn an ċéad léaċt annWhat time is the first lecture?

result.eng: The first class begins at eight o'clock.
result.ga: Tosaíonn an chéad rang ag a hocht a chlog
result.orig: Tosaíonn an chéad rang ag a hocht a chlog
result.html: Tosaíonn an chéad rang ag a hocht a chlogThe first class begins at eight o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Tosaíonn an ċéad rang ag a hoċt a ċlogThe first class begins at eight o'clock.

result.eng: The first bus was at 9.30.

result.orig: Bhí an chéad bhus ann ag leathuair tar éis a naoi
result.html: Bhí an chéad bhus ann ag leathuair tar éis a naoiThe first bus was at 9.30.

result.eng: I am in the first year.

result.html: Tá mé sa gcéad bhliainI am in the first year.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé sa gcéad ḃliainI am in the first year.

result.eng: She is my (first) cousin.
result.ga: Col ceathrar liom í
result.orig: Col ceathrar liom í
result.html: Col ceathrar liom íShe is my (first) cousin.
result.ponchtml: Col ceaṫrar liom íShe is my (first) cousin.

result.eng: This was the first time Italy won.

result.eng: The first place I went to when I moved to Berlin was the city centre.
result.ga: An chéad áit a ndeachaigh mé nuair a bhog mé go Beirlín ná lár na cathrach

result.eng: The first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.
result.ga: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rud
result.orig: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rud
result.html: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rudThe first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.
result.ponchtml: B'é scéiṁliṫeoireaċt an ċéad rud a riṫ le daoine sular ṫáinig deiṁniú gurḃ iad cúinsí seismeaċa ba ċúis leis an rudThe first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.

result.eng: I was reminded of my first visit to America, many years ago.

result.eng: First thing in the morning.
result.ga: Ar béal maidine
